text: Paleoanthropology (or palaeoanthropology) combines the study of paleontology and physical anthropology. It is the study of human evolution. The subject is also closely connected to archaeology.Barry Lewis; Robert Jurmain & Lynn Kilgore 2013. Understanding humans: an introduction to physical anthropology and archaeology. 11th ed, Belmont CA: Wadsworth Cengage Learning, p. 18. The evidence of tool-making and other activities shows the subtle but important changes in thinking that early humans went through. == Related pages == *Human evolution *Palaeolithic == References == Category:Subfields of paleontology Category:Evolution Category:Physical anthropology
